name: faux knit twisted ear warmer
notes:
this pattern is available for free at https://www.windingroadcrochet.com/how-to-crochet-twisted-ear-warmer-pattern/

or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern.

the pattern is written in english using us terms and has been written for 3 different yarns sizes and has size baby through adult sizes.

pattern level: easy
this pattern uses the chain, single crochet, single crochet increase, and working into the sides of rows.

materials needed:
size 4-6 yarn
5, 6.5, or 10 mm crochet hook
yarn needle and scissors
polyfil

this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download, not a finished product. please make sure to download adobe reader at www.adobe.com if you do not already have it on your computer.
